story.title: My Story: Beyond the Code
story.subtitle: A Testament to Persistence and Passion
story.p1: My career began not in front of a screen, but with my hands—mastering trades like professional hairstyling, culinary arts, and operating heavy machinery. These roles taught me discipline, attention to detail, and the art of client satisfaction.
story.p2: However, a deep‑seated curiosity for how things work led me to the world of technology. I embarked on an intense journey of self‑directed learning, dedicating thousands of hours to mastering software engineering from the ground up.
story.p3: This culminated in my acceptance and outstanding performance in the ALX Software Engineering program, a rigorous 18‑month curriculum where I solidified my skills in full‑stack development, algorithms, and system design, finishing with a score of 106.76%.

interests.title: Beyond the Screen
interests.description: When I'm not coding, I pursue interests that further enrich my perspective and problem‑solving abilities.

cta.title: Ready to Collaborate?
cta.description: My unique background and proven resilience make me a valuable asset. Let's build something impactful together.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.content: I believe that true innovation comes from a blend of diverse experiences. My path wasn't linear, and that's my greatest strength. I tackle problems with a unique perspective, combining practical, hands‑on skills with deep technical knowledge.

resume.pageDescription: Download my professional resume optimized for ATS systems and adapted to international standards.
resume.summary: Self‑taught Full‑Stack Software Engineer with demonstrated expertise in building and deploying scalable web applications and AI‑powered systems. Completed intensive 18‑month ALX Software Engineering program with exceptional performance (106.76%). Proven track record of developing production‑ready applications with modern technologies including Python, JavaScript, React, and cloud deployment platforms. Strong background in API development, database design, and DevOps practices. Committed to continuous learning and excellence in software development.

achievements.2: Built AI‑powered systems achieving 85% accuracy in intent recognition
achievements.3: Created comprehensive documentation and API specifications using Swagger/OpenAPI
achievements.4: Established CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%
